Data Dictionary - Team Stats

dictionary_team_stats.Rmd
knitr::kable(cbbreadr::dictionary_team_stats)
field data_type description
season integer An integer corresponding to a season of college basketball. CBBD’s convention is to use the year in which the championship takes place, so if a game took place in the fall of 2024, the season would be recorded as ““2025”“.
season_label character A string identifying the two years that one college basketball season spans, e.g. ““20242025”“.
team_id integer A unique identifier for each team.
team character The name of the team.
conference character The conference the team plays in.
games integer The number of games a team played.
wins integer The number of wins the team recorded.
losses integer The number of losses the team recorded.
total_minutes integer The number of minutes a team played.
pace numeric The number of possessions in games the team played in divided by the number of minutes played by the team, multiplied by 40 minutes.
team_stats_assists integer The number of assists recorded by the team.
team_stats_blocks integer The number of blocks recorded by the team.
team_stats_steals integer The number of steals recorded by the team.
team_stats_possessions integer The number of possessions recorded by the team.
team_stats_true_shooting numeric An adjusted statistic that reflects a team’s skill at shooting three-pointers, two-pointers, and free throws. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/True_shooting_percentage
team_stats_rating numeric A metric created by Dean Oliver to measure how many points per 100 possessions a team generates on offense. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Offensive_rating
team_stats_field_goals_made integer The number of shots from the floor a team made.
team_stats_field_goals_attempted integer The number of shots from the floor a team attempted.
team_stats_field_goals_pct numeric The number of field goals made divided by the number of field goals attempted.
team_stats_two_point_field_goals_made integer The number of two-point shots a team made.
team_stats_two_point_field_goals_attempted integer The number of two-point shots a team attempted.
team_stats_two_point_field_goals_pct numeric The number of two-point shots a team made divded by the number of two-point shots they attempted.
team_stats_three_point_field_goals_made integer The number of three-point shots a team made.
team_stats_three_point_field_goals_attempted integer The number of three-point shots a team attempted.
team_stats_three_point_field_goals_pct numeric The number of three-point shots a team made divided by the number of three-point shots they attempted.
team_stats_free_throws_made integer The number of free throw shots a team made.
team_stats_free_throws_attempted integer The number of free throw shots a team attempted.
team_stats_free_throws_pct numeric The number of free throw shots a team made divded by the number of free throw shots they attempted.
team_stats_rebounds_offensive integer The number of offensive rebounds a team recorded.
team_stats_rebounds_defensive integer The number of defensive rebounds a team recorded.
team_stats_rebounds_total integer The total number of rebounds a team recorded, offensive and defensive.
team_stats_turnovers_total integer How many turnovers the team committed.
team_stats_turnovers_team_total integer How many team turnovers the team committed. This includes turnovers like dead-ball turnovers.
team_stats_fouls_total integer How many fouls the team committed.
team_stats_fouls_technical integer How many technical fouls the team committed.
team_stats_fouls_flagrant integer How many flagrant fouls the team committed.
team_stats_points_total integer The number of points the team scored.
team_stats_points_in_paint integer The number of points the team recorded scoring in the paint.
team_stats_points_off_turnovers integer The number of points the team recorded off turnovers by the opposing team.
team_stats_points_fast_break integer The number of points the team recorded on fast breaks.
team_stats_four_factors_effective_field_goal_pct numeric An adjusted statistic that reflects the value of three-pointers relative to all other baskets by weighing three points more, representing a team’s shooting efficiency. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Effective_field_goal_percentage
team_stats_four_factors_turnover_ratio numeric The number of free throws a team attempted divded by the number of field goals a team attempted. This metric is commonly used to evaluate a team’s ability to draw personal fouls.
team_stats_four_factors_offensive_rebound_pct numeric The number of assists a team records divided by the number of turnovers they commit. This metric is commonly used to evaluate the accuracy of a team’s passing.
team_stats_four_factors_free_throw_rate numeric An estimate of the rate at which a team secured offensive reboulds, measured as OREB / the total number of balls that a team could have rebounded. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebound_rate
opponent_stats_assists integer The number of assists recorded by the team’s opponent.
opponent_stats_blocks integer The number of blocks recorded by the team’s opponent.
opponent_stats_steals integer The number of steals recorded by the team’s opponent.
opponent_stats_possessions integer The number of possessions recorded by the team’s opponent.
opponent_stats_true_shooting numeric An adjusted statistic that reflects a team’s skill at shooting three-pointers, two-pointers, and free throws. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/True_shooting_percentage
opponent_stats_rating numeric A metric created by Dean Oliver to measure how many points per 100 possessions a team generates on offense. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Offensive_rating
opponent_stats_field_goals_made integer The number of shots from the floor a team made.
opponent_stats_field_goals_attempted integer The number of shots from the floor a team attempted.
opponent_stats_field_goals_pct numeric The number of field goals made divided by the number of field goals attempted.
opponent_stats_two_point_field_goals_made integer The number of two-point shots a team made.
opponent_stats_two_point_field_goals_attempted integer The number of two-point shots a team attempted.
opponent_stats_two_point_field_goals_pct numeric The number of two-point shots a team made divded by the number of two-point shots they attempted.
opponent_stats_three_point_field_goals_made integer The number of three-point shots a team made.
opponent_stats_three_point_field_goals_attempted integer The number of three-point shots a team attempted.
opponent_stats_three_point_field_goals_pct numeric The number of three-point shots a team made divided by the number of three-point shots they attempted.
opponent_stats_free_throws_made integer The number of free throw shots a team made.
opponent_stats_free_throws_attempted integer The number of free throw shots a team attempted.
opponent_stats_free_throws_pct numeric The number of free throw shots a team made divded by the number of free throw shots they attempted.
opponent_stats_rebounds_offensive integer The number of offensive rebounds a team recorded.
opponent_stats_rebounds_defensive integer The number of defensive rebounds a team recorded.
opponent_stats_rebounds_total integer The total number of rebounds a team recorded, offensive and defensive.
opponent_stats_turnovers_total integer How many turnovers the team’s opponent committed.
opponent_stats_turnovers_team_total integer How many team turnovers the team’s opponent committed. This includes turnovers like dead-ball turnovers.
opponent_stats_fouls_total integer How many fouls the team’s opponent committed.
opponent_stats_fouls_technical integer How many technical fouls the team’s opponent committed.
opponent_stats_fouls_flagrant integer How many flagrant fouls the team’s opponent committed.
opponent_stats_points_total integer The number of points the team scored.
opponent_stats_points_in_paint integer The number of points the team’s opponent recorded scoring in the paint.
opponent_stats_points_off_turnovers integer The number of points the team’s opponent recorded off turnovers by the opposing team.
opponent_stats_points_fast_break integer The number of points the team’s opponent recorded on fast breaks.
opponent_stats_four_factors_effective_field_goal_pct numeric An adjusted statistic that reflects the value of three-pointers relative to all other baskets by weighing three points more, representing a team’s shooting efficiency. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Effective_field_goal_percentage
opponent_stats_four_factors_turnover_ratio numeric The number of free throws a team attempted divded by the number of field goals a team attempted. This metric is commonly used to evaluate a team’s ability to draw personal fouls.
opponent_stats_four_factors_offensive_rebound_pct numeric The number of assists a team records divided by the number of turnovers they commit. This metric is commonly used to evaluate the accuracy of a team’s passing.
opponent_stats_four_factors_free_throw_rate numeric An estimate of the rate at which a team secured offensive reboulds, measured as OREB / the total number of balls that a team could have rebounded. For more details, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebound_rate
